Class Equipment

java.lang.Object
  Item
      Equipment

public class Equipment
extends Item

An item that the player can equip and gain bonuses from

Constructor Summary
Equipment(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String desc, int p, boolean se, int sl, int sT, int sB)
          Creates a piece of equipment with the appropriate perameters

Constructor Detail

Equipment

public Equipment(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String desc,
                 int p,
                 boolean se,
                 int sl,
                 int sT,
                 int sB)
Creates a piece of equipment with the appropriate perameters

Parameters:
name - The name of the equipment
desc - The ingame description of the equipment
p - The price of the equipment
se - Whether of not the equipment can be sold
sl - The slot that the equipment gets equipped to (0-Head, 1-Neck, 2-Chest, 3-Hand, 4-Ring, 5-Legs)
sT - The type of stat the equipment boosts (0-Strength, 1-Agility, 2-Defense, 3-Health, 4-Charm)
sB - The ammount the stat gets increased when the equipment is equipped
